parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

display.description: Describes the properties of an Appliances Operation Value Display.

operation.description: The display name of the compute operation.

provider.description: The resource provider for the operation.

resource.description: The display name of the resource the operation applies to.

isDataAction.description: Is this Operation a data plane operation

name.description: The name of the compute operation.

origin.description: The origin of the compute operation.

get.summary: Gets a list of Appliances in a subscription.
get.description: Gets a list of Appliances in the specified subscription. The operation returns properties of each Appliance

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

name.description: The name of the resource

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

properties.description: The set of properties specific to an Appliance

infrastructureConfig.description: Contains infrastructure information about the Appliance

provisioningState.description: The current deployment or provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

publicKey.description: Certificates pair used to download MSI certificate from HIS. Can only be set once.

status.description: Appliance’s health and state of connection to on-prem

version.description: Version of the Appliance

delete.description: Deletes an Appliance with the specified Resource Name, Resource Group, and Subscription Id.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: Appliances name.

202.description: Accepted. The response indicates the delete operation is performed in the background.

204.description: NoContent. The response indicates the appliance resource is already deleted.
